package description: Two-dimensional implementation of Conway's Game of Life running in a three-dimensional environment.

cell types.cell description: 2D dead game of life cell operating on the XY plane.
2D dead game of life cell operating on the YZ plane.
2D dead game of life cell operating on the ZX plane.
2D living game of life cell operating on the XY plane
2D living game of life cell operating on the YZ plane
2D living game of life cell operating on the ZX plane
